title: "I am here for you": How relational conversational AI appeals to adolescents, especially those who are socially and emotionally vulnerable
summary: General-purpose conversational AI chatbots and AI companions increasingly provide young adolescents with emotionally supportive conversations, raising questions about how conversational style shapes anthropomorphism and emotional reliance.
